Title: ZuneCardr
Description: ZuneCardr makes it easier for anyone to view Zune Card data, without needing to use the normal Zune Card and save other Zune Card designs with customisation options and more such as Styles and Themes. It is developed in Visual Web Developer 2010 Express using Silverlight 4.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ZuneCardr makes it easier for anyone to view Zune Card data, without needing to use the normal Zune Card and save other Zune Card designs with customisation options and more such as Styles and Themes. It is developed in Visual Web Developer 2010 Express using Silverlight 4.0.

Features

  • View Zune Card data by Zune Tag.
  • View Album, Artist and Release Information.
  • View Favourite and Recent Tracks.
  • View Badges earned.
  • Displays Album Art, Artist Image and Badges.
  • Compose custom Zune Card.
  • Multiple Styles and Themes supported.

Requirements

  • Silverlight 4.0 (beta)

Instructions

  • Install the Application
  • Enter the Zune Tag
  • View the Favourite, Recent, Artists and Badges
  • Select those to be used, next Step allows selection of Zune Card styles and themes.
  • Save the completed Zune Card!

Additional

The Images and Data come from the Zune Social / Zune Card source and are the property and / or copyright of their respective owners and may not be used for commercial purposes
without the express permission of the copyright holder. Zune / Zune Card service is the property and copyright of Microsoft Corporation, all rights reserved.
